metadata.description: Full stack engineer combining frontend and backend expertise for end-to-end development

skills.description: Core language skills for both frontend and backend Node.js development

skills.name: Backend Framework (Node/Python)
skills.description: Express.js, Django, or similar - building APIs and server logic

skills.name: Data Structures & Algorithms
skills.description: DSA fundamentals for interviews and problem-solving

skills.name: Database Design & SQL

skills.description: RESTful APIs, GraphQL, API versioning and design patterns

skills.name: CSS & Responsive Design
skills.description: CSS fundamentals, Flexbox, Grid, responsive design

skills.name: System Design Fundamentals
skills.description: Design scalable systems, architecture patterns, microservices basics

skills.name: State Management

skills.name: Authentication & Security

skills.name: Testing (Unit & Integration)
skills.description: Jest, Mocha, testing strategies, TDD fundamentals
